resolveBinding

public static java.lang.Object resolveBinding(java.lang.Object object)
Resolves a binding by looking up its display name.

The resolution method creates a display name for instances of the following types:

  • DeployModelObject using #getName(DeployModelObject)
  • EClass using #getName(EClass)
  • EAttribute using #getName(EAttribute)

Parameters:
object - the object to be resolved.
Returns:
the resolved binding, or the same object.

bind

public static java.lang.String bind(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.Object binding)
Bind the given message's substitution locations with the given string value.

Prior to substitution, the binding is resolved using resolveBinding(Object).

Parameters:
message - the message to be manipulated
binding - the object to be inserted into the message
Returns:
the manipulated String
See Also:
NLS#bind(String, Object)

bind

public static java.lang.String bind(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.Object binding1,
                                    java.lang.Object binding2)
Bind the given message's substitution locations with the given string value.

Prior to substitution, the binding is resolved using resolveBinding(Object).

Parameters:
message - the message to be manipulated
binding1 - the first object to be inserted into the message
binding2 - the second object to be inserted into the message
Returns:
the manipulated String
See Also:
NLS#bind(String, Object, Object)

bind

public static java.lang.String bind(java.lang.String message,
                                    java.lang.Object[] bindings)
Bind the given message's substitution locations with the given string values.

Prior to substitution, the bindings are resolved using resolveBinding(Object).

Parameters:
message - the message to be manipulated
bindings - An array of objects to be inserted into the message
Returns:
the manipulated String
See Also:
NLS#bind(String, Object[])
